WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue is already addressed by cell caching
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

In php , i read an excel file with more 100000 rows during this process i receive this message.

Fatal error: Out of memory (allocated 762314752) (tried to allocate 60 bytes) in D:\WEBSEP\client\jetj\phpexcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Worksheet.php on line 1218

Same test with 10000 rows , i can read my excel file and perform this process.
My program read each line and insert rows in mysql table. 


Apache 2.2
PHP 5.3

I had hanged parameter on PHP ini and accept 
memory_limit = 2048M


Best regards.
WorkItem.Summary: Fatal error during read an xlsx file

Comments.Message: To reduce the memory overhead of loading a large spreadsheet into memory, look at the documentation on cell caching
